entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: `System.Text.Json`. Add ability to convert a JSON array to `[Flags]` enum #70864
  • Strange runtime failure - unmanaged heap corruption #70860
  • [API Proposal]: Update to the `LibraryImport` custom marshalling shape #70859
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Random `Uncaught Error: Assert failed: subtle crypto not initialized` in `WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Security.Cryptography.Tests` #70858
  • [wasm] Random uncaught js exceptions in `System.Security.Cryptography.Tests` on the browser #70856
  • emitter::emitDispIns() does not print LARGEJMP instruction code on ARM64 #70849
    Future
  • Statically Linked NativeAOT HelloWorld throws Segmentation fault with Globalization Cultural Data #70848
    Future
  • [wasm] `Csc` task failing with `Unexpected exception:` - ` (ReleaseMutex failed. WaitOne Id: 13 Release Id: 13)` #70836
  • `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzer` should support top-level statements #70835
    7.0.0
  • ExecutionEngineException is thrown in .net7 WPF app when i EnC #70834
  • Weird issue with stale File.GetCreationTimeUtc (Windows only) #70830
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.RentReturnArrayPoolTests<Object> #70839
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.Perf_AsyncMethods #70842
  • [Android] JIT/opt/OSR/pinnedlocal/pinnedlocal.sh #70820
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger][firefox] Add exception handling in evaluateJSAsync #70819
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests<Byte> #70844
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.RentReturnArrayPoolTests<Byte> #70845
  • X509Chain do not build chain online with a download certificate by HTTPS schema on Linux #70816
  • NativeAOT compiler crashes if assembly missing #70815
  • TimeZoneInfo.GetUtcOffset returns different value on Windows and Linux #70813
  • Add support for ILLink.Descriptors.xml #70810
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fetching assemblies in the debug proxy is (possibly) slower now #70807
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\HardwareIntrinsics\\X86\\Sse2\\Sse2_ro\\Sse2_ro.cmd #70804
  • [libraries-pgo]: Assertion failed 'fgDominate(head, entry)' in 'System.Text.Encoding:GetByteCount(System.String,int,int):int:this' during 'Hoist loop code' (IL size 109; hash 0x10278d31; Tier1) #70802
    7.0.0

Closed

  • CSharpCodeGenerator---FromFileBatch Implementation request #70817
  • StreamContent.ReadOnlyStream fails Stream conformance tests #70725
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: all ilasm/ildasm round-trip tests failing #68455
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] emscripten 2.0.21 introduces failures where UnauthorizedAccessException is not thrown #53021
    7.0.0
  • C# Dictionary insertion speed could be improved (performance) #70796
  • Regressions from vector constants change #70368
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in multiple benchmarks after `char.Is*` update #69727
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/28/2022 1:41:21 AM #70162
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 5/21/2022 4:54:11 AM #69725
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_String #70161
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failure while crossgenning ImageSharp: '!op1->TypeIs(TYP_STRUCT) && (op1->TypeGet() == op2->TypeGet())' in 'SixLabors.ImageSharp.PixelFormats.Byte4:ToString():System.String:this' during 'Morph - Global' #70824
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in IndexOf #70158
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringSegmentBenchmark #70503
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.Tests.Perf_Encoding and Perf_Encoders #70501
    7.0.0
  • Marshal.PtrToStructure support in reflection free Native AOT #70837
  • [Perf] Changes at 6/2/2022 10:27:31 PM #70499
    7.0.0
  • [Jit x86] Checked Constraint Doesn't Participate in Dead Code Elimination #9228
    Future
  • [QUIC] Call `LocalCertificateSelectionCallback` before handshake #70651
    7.0.0
  • ActivitySource.CreateActivity returns null even when supplied with listeners #70840
  • Ad-hoc codesign on macOS #65228
  • Use live apphost build in crossgen2 #66866
  • [API Proposal]: Fix to ActivityListener.ShouldListenTo edge case #70727
    Future
  • "No output has been received" when debugging Blazor Wasm in the browser - can't debug #70841
  • Iconize executable #69372
    Future
  • Azure DevOps is down - all CI jobs failing #69374
  • Difference in code quality: inline vs. local vector #64879
    7.0.0
  • Blazor RegionInfo delivers wrong NativeName #53880
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Check if `python` is installed when installing the workload #54638
    7.0.0
  • Debugger - Blazor WASM: Uncaught pause_on_uncaught (anonymous) @ VM324:1 #62146
    7.0.0
  • DAC heapwalker doesn't detect memory corruption that makes objects appear to have zero size #70750
    7.0.0
  • Marshal.PtrToStructure intrinsic should make sure the ctor is reflectable #70072
    7.0.0
  • PAX Tar timestamps from extended attributes parsing may not be a `double`, but `long.long` #70801
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix for timer scheduling happening on the incorrect thread when wasm threading is enabled #70863
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, WASM, 7.0.0
  • Use `Array.Empty()` in `System.Reflection.Metadata`. #70862
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Support `PUTARG_SPLIT(STRUCT LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD)` on ARM/64 #70861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use hash/hmac one shots in NTLM #70857
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Delete StaticallyLinked property from Microsoft.NETCore.Native.Unix.props #70854
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix bug in Tar preventing extraction of hardlinks or entries starting with `.\` #70853
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Assign proper VNs to "shared constant" CSE defs #70852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Extend MonoAOTCompiler Task #70851
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove allocation in ImmutableArray Builder Sort #70850
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Small performance cleanup in S.S.Cryptography #70847
    area-System.Security
  • WIP: Do not generate impossible instantiations for constrained generics in Mono AOT #70838
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix GC stress failure in LoaderAllocator::CompareExchangeValueInHandle #70832
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable lib tests that used to fail with GC issues #70831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Migrate to ref/out param while reading data from typed array #70823
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • X509Certificates.Tests: make tests pass when rsa+sha1 signing is not supported. #70821
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Simplify instructions for using ILC #70811
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: break loop canonicalization into two stages #70809
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for randomized guard stack cookies #70806
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [coop] fix coop suspend timeout cue card #70828
    area-Threading-mono
  • Catch (more) mismatched args in `fgMorphArgs` #70846
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a few Stream-related issues in System.Net.Http #70731
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix corerun for assemblies with mismatched filename #70800
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Use IndexOf{Any} in a few more places #70176
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Enabled WriteToReadOnly tests - emscripten bug got fixed #70814
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO
  • [Mono] Disable long running test on Android #70843
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable IDE1005 (Delegate invocation can be simplified) #70522
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Disable WBT test failing on windows #70808
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Tighten checks in `areArgumentsContiguous` #70829
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Narrow cast fix #70518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add limited support for LocalCertificateSelectionCallback for QUIC #70716
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Delete redundant aliases for primitive types #70805
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Simplify `Environment.IsWindows8OrAbove`. #70818
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add two new stages to prepare for our new custom type marshalling design. #70598
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add icon to dotnet.exe on Windows #70578
    area-Host
  • Use LastIndexOf in ZipArchiveEntry.GetFileName_Unix #70701
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Update dogfooding instructions #70833
    area-Meta
  • JIT: relax fwd sub restriction on changing class handle #70587
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix jump removal regression blocking jit_stress_splitting in runtime-jit-experimental #70797
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix emitDispJumpList for Arm64 #70542
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable ThreadAbort with CET enabled via the QueueUserAPC2 #70803
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add end-to-end test for NTLM/Negotiate authentication against fake server #70630
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove workaround to get pauseOnExceptions setting #70748
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Avoid infinite loop in case of heap corruption #70759
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: rework optCanonicalizeLoop #70792
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add support for cross module inlining and cross module generic compilation to Crossgen2 #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Don't use addressing modes for volatile loads for gc types #70794
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • ARM64 - Optimize `i % 2` #70599
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Initialize Generation Aware Analysis later #70764
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix building with clang 14 #69990
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add event to capture min/max threads #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Use `gtEffectiveVal` for `GT_ADD` op1 in `optCreateAssertion` #70228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Enable `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_VAR/LCL_FLD` call args on Windows x64 #70777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable IDE0020 (Use pattern matching) #70523
    area-Meta
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.12 #70693
    area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • fix: [Wasm] Add missing libicudata.a for native layout #70682
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • EventLogException is missing the original win32 error code #70629
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, community-contribution
  • VM: Better strategy for TryReserveInitialMemory on arm64 (jump stubs) #70707
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Enable IDE0054 (Use compound assignment) #70564
    area-Meta
  • Add AddSystemd() and AddWindowsService() IServiceCollection extension methods #68580
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • [mono] Fix SpanHelpers.Reverse regression #70650
    area-System.Memory
  • Allow `TYP_STRUCT` `LCL_FLD` on the LHS of block copies #70782
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix default log color behavior when console is redirected #70504
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use new byte[] span optimization in a few more places #70665
    area-Meta
  • Minor refactoring for `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzer` #70767
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update the version of dotnet used for Maui stuff from 6.0.3 to 6.0.4. #70788
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Reduce contention for Datacontract Serialization #70668
    area-Serialization
  • Implement NarrowUtf16ToAscii for AArch64 #70080
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fixing the handling of Positive NaN in Math.Min for float/double #70795
    area-System.Numerics
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement Vector128 version of System.Buffers.Text.Base64 DecodeFromUtf8 and EncodeToUtf8 #70654
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • Remove some dead code / branches #70146
    area-Meta
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Improve TLS1.3 detection in registry for QUIC #70730
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Use crypto.subtle for HMAC on Browser WASM #70745
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • Unpin locals, attempt 2 #70655
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr, arch-ppc64le
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70179
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Switch default modules to es6 #70746
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Implement NegotiateAuthentication API #70720
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Improve tiering performance #70649
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JSON contract customization #70435
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [API Implementation]: Add `Order` and `OrderDescending` to `Enumerable` and `Queryable` #70525
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Allow child process reaping by other thread(library) #70705
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Convert fallback path of GetCommandLineArgs to managed #70608
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix race condition between GCInfo and Rundown #70609
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-sdk-6.0 version 6.0.301 on Ubuntu LTS 22.04 breaks the Q# Language Extension in Visual Studio Code #26065
  • `dotnet sln add` can create parent solution folders when adding existing projects #26064
  • Build failed with exception #26060
  • Failure to publish WASM when project source path contains blank spaces - Post-upgrade VS 2022 to 17.2.4 #26061
  • With .NET7 preview 6 SDK installed on Turkish OS, error happen when dotnet publish with AOT enable. #26053
  • runtime is missing in global location #26052
  • WebAssembly workload should check if `python` is available, when installing on Linux #26050

Closed

  • `dotnet test` fails to launch `DumpMinitool*.exe` because it is a DLL - doesn't produce dump for process of different architecture #25421

PullRequests

Created

  • Consume razor sg #26049
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #26048
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix copy&paste mistake in PublicSign preservation #25947
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Define SystemCollectionsImmutableVersion Versions.props #26007
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Force rebuilding R2R images if project files have been changed #26046
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #26013
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #26012
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Support workload pack groups for repair, download, and show URL operations #25829
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630
    Working Set

PullRequests

Created

  • Add UTF8 byte representation concatenation operator to utf8-string-literals.md #6221

Merged

  • Update static-abstracts-in-interfaces.md based on the latest LDM decisions #6216

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Feature "Sync-File-Names" #61973
  • Promote CompletionList.ItemsList to public API #61971
  • Null check inside a loop affects CS8602 for unrelated code in the same method #61964
    17.3
  • CS8866 is reported for properties in nested records with the same name as their enclosing type instead of CS0542 #61961
    Backlog
  • Mismatch between CSDiagnostic line number in message and location #61960
    17.3
  • CompletionProvider descriptions not working #61950
    Backlog
  • [Hot Reload] Roslyn stops reporting edits in VS session due to debugger crash #61949
  • StringSyntax doesn't work on an attribute property assignment #61947

Closed

  • Unhelpful CS0119 error when unable to find a static abstract method to resolve #61486
    C# 11.0
  • C# interactive has problems with `switch` expression with `var` #59290
    Compiler.Next
  • Confirm whether we would like to support use of static abstract methods declared in interfaces as operators in query expressions #53796
    C# 11.0
  • Intermittent test TestGetCodeFixWithExceptionInFixableDiagnosticIds2 #21533
    Backlog
  • Contract violation in Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Editor.Tagging.AbstractAsynchronousTaggerProvider`1.TagSource.Finalize() during test run #21708
    Backlog
  • Symbol of closed Generic Attribute does not fill `TypeArguments` with correct symbols #61490
    17.3
  • Can't debug source generator using roslyn component if total dependency file path lengths is too big #55802
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Shadow Copy all analyzer dependencies #61974
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fix logic issue in find-refs that could fail to find related symbols in inheritance #61972
    Area-IDE
  • Fix reported accessibility issues with StackTrace Explorer #61970
    Area-IDE
  • Do not add cast to object when converting string.Format to interpolated string #61969
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Read editorconfig options from the editor in GetInferredFormattingOptions #61968
    Area-IDE
  • Use native azdo command for checkout #61965
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support virtual conversion and equality operators #61963
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
  • Fix race condition in FixAll tests based off TrackNodes functionality #61958
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #61957
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #61955
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.4 #61954
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add all references when finding symbols in implementation assemblies #61953
    Area-IDE
  • Support embedded languages on named attribute arguments #61951
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • SerializableOptionSet and IOptionService cleanup #61839
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve error message for lookup on a type parameter. #61967
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces, Next
  • Use 'Clear' to empty a CWT when on .net core #61952
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61966
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for additional file diagnostics in workspace pull #61930
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Don't use exceptions for flow control #61948
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #61945
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.4-vs-deps #61937
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61946
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.4 #61944
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • NRT enable symbolfinder/find-refs code. #61921
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Avoid accessing Document from formatter services #61928
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Convert connection lost exceptions to cancellations to avoid overreporting NFE #61792
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61975
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • [EnC] Allow deleting method #61806
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not report populate switch diagnostic when switch type is unknown #61809
    Area-IDE, Community
  • IOperation: expose information about the type parameter that is going to be used as the ".constrained" type for invoking abstract static methods #61811
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Skip assignment nullability warning in error case #61895
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge semantic snippets into main #61658
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Filter symbol first before creating InheritanceMargin target #61911
    Area-IDE
  • Do not show name suggestions after event name #61807
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers, Blocked
  • Merge CompletionServiceWithProviders into CompletionService #61943
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Simplify implementation of the FindRefsCache helper type #61941
    Area-IDE
  • Promote CompletionList.ItemsList to public API #61869
    Area-IDE, IDE-IntelliSense
  • Remove crash workaround in `.editorconfig` #60535
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Bind switch expression with checked-aware binder #61890
    Area-Compilers
  • Classify pattern variables #59735
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use BackgroundWorkIndicator for Rename Command Handler #61906
    Area-IDE
  • Add Document Outline Tool Window #61784
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • The remote certificate is invalid according to the validation procedure #42244
  • Unable to create Blazor Server project with Identity feature. #42242
  • Health Checks: publish health report on event #42241
  • Implicitly added AuthN/AuthZ middleware leads to unexpected behavior #42240
    7.0-preview6
  • [Blazor] Reference to component (@ref) is set after entire container is rendered #42239
  • No nullable warning on WaitForShutdown() #42238
  • Introduce WebApplicationBuilder.Authorization property that allows for AuthZ setup #42235
    7.0-preview7
  • Automatically generate OpenAPI security schemas for bearer-based auth #42234
    7.0-preview6
  • Getting Unwanted error logs in console. #42228
  • 'Permission denied' running asp.net core web api from VS Code #42226
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.6.22313.7] Blazor Server apps with System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException Error when accessing with https #42224
  • HttpResponse.ContentType is marked as String but is null sometimes #42222
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.ClientAssets - An improvement proposal #42220
    Discussions

Closed

  • InvokeAsync<IJSObjectReference?>() call does not return when js value is null or undefined #40272
    .NET 7 Planning
  • user-jwts issues #42113
    7.0-preview6
  • Support O DateTime(Offset) format in dotnet user-jwts tool #41973
    7.0-preview6
  • WebApplicationFactory.Client should fail with DisposedException but does not. #33645
    7.0-preview6
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #42174
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs #42225
  • W3CLogger follow-ups #33945
    .NET 7 Planning
  • dotnet watch locked on file changed #41654
  • System.NullReferenceException at Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpRequest.get_HasFormContentType() #41574
  • add support for dynamic consents in RemoteAuthenticatorView #42202
  • cannot be packaged staticwebassets.pack.json not found #42200
  • Support binding parameters to type Uri in Minimal Actions #36649
    .NET 8 Planning
  • IDX10206: Unable to validate audience. The 'audiences' parameter is empty #42207
  • Perf improvement: json #42160

PullRequests

Created

  • Partition more ConcurrentQueues in Kestrel #42237
    area-runtime
  • [SignalR] Replace Single(connectionId) with Client(connectionId) and Caller #42236
    area-signalr
  • HttpSys log correct statuscode when application throws #42223
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • catch JS exceptions when using InvokeAsync and throw them in .NET #41916
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix up user-jwts interactions #42125

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DatePicker and TimePicker opened unexpectedly when navigating back to previous page on Android API 21 and 23 #8130
  • IsVisible Not Render or Update from IsVisible = False to True. #8129
  • Review the performance implications of using a Concurrent Dictionary inside WrappedServiceProvider #8128
    .NET 7
  • [WinUI] Error deploying Sample.SingleProject in MainPage.xaml, "A cycle occurred while laying out the GUI." #8126
    6.0-sr2
  • Allow use of UITableViewStyle.GroupedInset style with TableView/ListView #8124
  • Navigation.PushAsync(); on windows platform throws exception: Catastrophic failure (0x8000FFFF (E_UNEXPECTED)) with same page instance #8123
  • Generics Serialization using Json.NET throws "Attempting to JIT compile method '(wrapper delegate-invoke)' while running in aot-only mode" in signed release build iOS-applications #8122
  • TapGestureRecognizer doesn't fire Tapped event on child controls #8121
  • Investigate converting all event subscriptions in our iOS handlers to delegates or our own delegates #8119
    6.0-sr3
  • Label italic width incorrect #8118
  • RadioButton on Windows not respecting margin #8116
  • Error "The specified deps.json ... does not exist" #8114
  • ScrollView does not scrollable to the End after window height resized. #8113
  • ListView doesn´t show separators between list items in Windows, but it does show on Android. iOS?? #8112
  • Frame.Background LinearGradientBrush not working on maccatalyst #8108
  • Grid with HeightRequest=0 no longer hides child elements #8105
  • Tabs within the shell do not execute override the OnAppearing method #8102
  • [Android] ObjectDisposedException 'AndroidX.AppCompat.View.Menu.MenuItemImpl' Modifying Shell Items #8101
  • Very Poor Performance in MAUI Android #8098
  • `CollectionView` requires `ScrollView` #8097

Closed

  • .NET MAUI in Visual Studio 2022 for Mac Preview #8127
  • AOT compiler not found when building for iOS #8106
  • Windows app maximum #8100
  • GestureRecognizers #7466
  • Application crashes on Startup if installed as MSIX package #7473
  • System.MissingMethodException: No parameterless constructor defined for type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Handlers.Compatibility.FrameRenderer' #7566
    6.0-sr2
  • [IOS] Launch performance #7687
  • DASH.js in BlazorWebView errors with 'MediaSource is not supported'. Works under Windows. #7909
  • CSS isolation not working in MAUI Blazor Hybrid for Windows when the assembly name is changed #8103
  • Error DEP0700: Registration of the app failed #7825
  • .net MAUI debugging -> GetCurrentDirectory() points to C:\windows\system32 #8091
  • Labels do not resize/reflow on Android when text is changed #8104
  • .net MAUI, Cannot create a log file in AppData/Roaming or AppData/Local #8090
  • How to select Maui version #8109
  • Shell.Set Presentation Mode bug - Android #8110
  • MAUI needs easy way to call a method like with UWP's "x:Bind" #7713
  • Unable to build iOS Binding Library wrapping iOS Framework Native Reference #8000
  • Build fails if app references library which contains framework library inside #7980
  • Target platform identifier android not recognized (6.0.400-preview.22301.10) #8072
  • Visual Studio 2022 17.0.3 Preview 1.0 change color icons in Maui to black. #8092
  • The "Xamarin.Android.Support.BuildTasks.VerifyVersionsTask" #8093
  • MSB4018 The "GenerateShims" task failed unexpectedly on MauiCheck #8094
  • Maui - No Capabilities Shown in Windows Manifest #8082
  • Maui Sample with errors NU1012 and NETSDK1139 #8081
  • Cannot create MAUI App Shell project #8080
  • Backgroundcolor of Radiobutton is wrong in .net MAUI. #8083
  • [Maui]Not able to Debug MAUI apps when using Net6.0 Tizen #8075
  • Frame Property "IsVisible" not being properly displayed when changing Boolean value to true in backend C# when initialized False in XAML #8084
  • Platform Independent Solution for MAUI WebView Control #8085
  • Directory.CreateDirectory does not work in Microsoft Visual Studio Community 2022 (64-bit) - Preview Version 17.3.0 Preview 1.0 #8089
  • Issue with OnPlatform in Maui #8073
  • Entry, Date Picker Control Unfocused Event Not Executing #8099
  • [Bug] Xamarin Page and View Templates break MAUI Apps #3200
    .NET 7
  • Pair to Mac fails on VS 2022 17.3.0 Preview 2.0 / 6.0.400 #8065
  • No output from console.Writeline or Logger.LogInformation in MAUI App #6941
    .NET 7
  • VSCode/CLI Support for running MAUI apps on Windows just like Mac #7659
  • cannot install maui main - Workload.Mono.ToolChain.Manifest missing signature #6470
    6.0-servicing
  • How to use Razor Component Library with .Net MAUI #6194
    Future
  • the following workloads must be installed: maccatalyst #6496
    .NET 7
  • MAUI Templates are missing in VS 2022 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #7819
  • No Maui Project Template and error: Platform version is not present for one or more target frameworks #5778
    6.0-servicing
  • New Page Feature in Visual Studio need update #6213
    6.0-servicing
  • .NET MAUI Templates not showing up - Windows 11, Visual Studio 2022 17.3.0 Preview 1.1 #8076

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is there a way to skip a property from insert? #28255
  • Why does EF Core use nested select statements in all joins? #28252
  • ef core call ChangeTracker.DetectChanges not fix up the navigtion property #28249
  • GroupJoin throws when applied on an anonymous return type output of another Linq #28248
  • Sequence contains no elements 7.0.0-preview.5.22302.2 #28247
  • Allow tagging migrations when applying them to database, and let unapplying them by tag. #28245
  • Hi-Lo doesn't work with TPC #28244
  • What does the time in Cosmos EF log entries represent? #28243

Closed

  • Add more methods to IConventionEntityTypeBuilder #19595
    6.0.0
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.SqlServer.NetTopologySuite not working with .NET6.0 application #28235
  • Remove tabs from T4 templates #26442
    7.0.0-preview6
  • EF.Functions.Contains blocking results from being returned #28251

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/3.1] Tools: Enable .NET Framework projects targeting win-arm64 #28254
  • "Scaffold" triggers for SQL Server #28253
  • Update to .NET SDK 7 Preview 5 #28250
  • Interceptor for identity resolution when attaching graphs #28246

Merged

  • Replace some 0x09 bytes with some 0x20 ones #28242

Updated

  • Json Columns initial work #28171
